text: Stephen "Steve" Murphy (born 1957) is an American federal agent who worked for the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA). Murphy and another agent named Javier Peña are known for being the lead investigators of Pablo Escobar, the Colombian drug lord and leader of the Medellín Cartel. Category:American police officers Category:1957 births Category:People from Tennessee Category:Living people
title: Stephen Murphy
